description: Bulk whole genome sequencing (WGS) using short-read or long-read platforms.
Bulk whole transcriptome sequencing using short-read platforms.
Nanorate sequencing; a variation of duplex sequencing.
Comprehensive DNA methylation sequencing to profile 6mA, 4mC and 5mC sites.
Concatenating Original Duplex for Error Correction (CODEC); a variation of duplex sequencing.
Sequencing each of the two strands of a DNA duplex.
Low-depth, high-throughput single-cell WGS using microfluidic devices and individual cell image capture.
Genomewide profiling of chromatin accessibility at the single-molecule level.
Multiplexed Arrays Sequencing of transcript isoforms; high-throughput sequencing of mRNA isoforms using long-read platforms.
Single-cell TOtal RNA Miniaturized sequencing; a single-cell full-length ribo-reduced total RNA sequencing using short-read platforms.
Single-cell full-length RNA-Seq using long-read platforms.
